::Spears::

Still in stasis lock in the lab, strapped to the table.  Her trainer 
program had almost finished it's attempt to deactivate the device 
that kept Spears in stasis lock.  Her body jerked and twitched as the 
trainer program finished with the device.  Her body lay perfectly 
still on the table.  Then her eyes opened slowly.  She looked around 
and checked her surroundings.  She noticed that she was in a lab.  
She tried to move, but found that the straps held her down tight.  
She even had her head bound down.  She couldn't sence any other bots, 
or any transmissions from her master.  The device over the table 
blocked all transmissions.  She looked around again with her eyes and 
breathed a deep sigh.  She didn't understand what was going on and 
she couldn't understand why they left her alone in the ship, let 
alone alive.  Her trainer program told her to escape and get find a 
way back to Prebon.  She took a deep breath, and yelled at the top of 
her lungs, " HHEEEELLLPPP!!!!"

She stopped and listend..nothing.  the only thing she heard was her 
own echo in the lab and in the halls outside.  She yelled again," 
HHEEEELLLPPP!!!!"  She listened again, hoping to hear the foot steps 
of someone coming for her. She hoped it might be a trainer.
